LanguageData.Miho_Ability_Repair.label: Field Repair
LanguageData.Miho_Ability_Repair.description: Repair your Miho mech right away without penalty.
LanguageData.Miho_Ability_Armor.label: Reinforce Armor
LanguageData.Miho_Ability_Armor.description: Reinforce the mechanoids armor to provide additional defence.
LanguageData.Miho_Ability_Accuracy.label: Holographic Sight
LanguageData.Miho_Ability_Accuracy.description: Grants a mechanoid advanced three-dimensional vision to increase accuracy.
LanguageData.Miho_Ability_Overclock.label: Overclock
LanguageData.Miho_Ability_Overclock.description: "With overwhelming force!" Improves the consciousness of the mechanoid.
LanguageData.Miho_Ability_BulletHell.label: Bullet Hell
LanguageData.Miho_Ability_HackingSlow.label: Neurohacking (Slow)
LanguageData.Miho_Ability_HackingSlow.description: Hacks the consciousness of an artificial intelligence and lowers the overall level of consciousness.
LanguageData.Miho_Ability_HackingKill.label: Neurohacking (Kill)
LanguageData.Miho_Ability_HackingKill.description: Prevent heat dissipation in a mechanoid to melt its circuits.
LanguageData.Miho_Ability_SpawnGenerator.label: Summon Power Cell
LanguageData.Miho_Ability_SpawnGenerator.description: Draw power from the surroundings and summon an unstable power cell.
